custom_css: body {background-image: url("https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0708/1115/6748/files/bg_450x.jpg?v=1699445874"); background-size: cover; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-attachment: fixed;}
.nav-bar {width: 100%; /* Ensure the navigation bar takes full width */ background-color: #E2B175; /* Dark brown color, resembling coffee */}
.wrapper {max-width: 1200px; /* This constrains the content to a maximum width, you may want to change or remove this */ margin: 0 auto; /* This centers the content within the nav-bar */}
/* Additional CSS for white text in the navigation bar */.nav-bar a {color: #ffffff; /* White color for text */ text-decoration: none; /* No underline on links */}
.nav-bar a:hover {color: #dddddd; /* Lighter shade for hover effect */}
